sourcesContent:
import './MainCard.css' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import Image from '../placeholder-300×225.jpeg' import React from 'react' export const MainCard = () => { const textForMaincard = "We must hold our organizations accountable where they control \n the doors by demanding clarity and tranparency around \n succession planning. - Ruth Porat, CFO at Alptha"; textForMaincard.split(/(\n)/); return (
Card title This is a wider card with supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content. This content is a little bit longer. { textForMaincard}
) } export default MainCard
